Title: Neuronal Mechanisms and Transformations Encoding Time-Varying Signals
Abstract: © 2016 Elsevier Inc.Sensation in natural environments requires the analysis of time-varying signals. While previous work has uncovered how a signal's temporal rate is represented by neurons in sensory cortex, in this issue of Neuron, new evidence from Gao et al. (2016) provides insights on the underlying mechanisms.
